item.description:
Have a VISION???

Seeking Mom-preneurs for a twelve week Entrepreneur Support Group for Woman at the Growing Green Wellness Center. Join the MAMALUTION – the revolution of moms with ideas for changing the world – for the better!

Together we will exchange our passions, listen to guest speakers, clarify our intentions and build our businesses. The Women's Entrepreneur Support Group connects mom business owners. It's a network where promoting your own business is encouraged. It's a place to share business building information to encourage mom entrepreneurs to success! A support network that will give you the tools you need!

For details & to pre-register email Rene@thegreenvibration.com
item.name: Women's Entrepreneur Support Group
